topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bc806163687229bddf0400#post_54bc806163687229bddf0400
I'll grab it for you

"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bc453c6368723d389a0c00#post_54bc453c6368723d389a0c00
[bq="EHAN"]Ok, something big is going on in the world of Mystery Skulls Animated

Let's start with Lewis' character profile
!http://media.tumblr.com/305d25f70c437622f310e249cf05ae8d/tumblr_inline_nfxknvyxiw1rzorzv.gif!
Pretty normal, pretty funny too (he likes Sailor Moon and alpacas)

But then someone noticed something in the bottom right corner of the image, and it all escalated from there
!http://i.imgur.com/AKTPk0v.png!
"Listen for yourself":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YlEb3L1PIco

BUT WE'RE NOT DONE YET! -CALL RIGHT NOW AND WE'LL TRIPLE THE OFFER-

Early this morning, MysteryBen posted a new character profile to his tumblr:
!http://31.media.tumblr.com/6172c4c242360d79e48f1d3c56cf420d/tumblr_nicxwqc0uU1rk23vqo1_500.gif!
Some are speculating that this is Mystery's previous owner, as they both seem to be characters straight out of Japanese folklore or whatever

Plus the fact that the text at the top says "You can't run forever, mutt"

BUT THERE'S STILL MORE

The kanji on the new character profile translates to "White Forest" (白 white, 森 forest)

Go back to those 15 seconds, and we have (after the kitchen cleaning sounds) a forest, that isn't quite white, but particularly RED
!http://media.tumblr.com/31ccfaec4ec0fa441069f822378a2c6d/tumblr_inline_nidwvaH0Fx1rzorzv.png!
And who's red?
!http://media.tumblr.com/47c155fef638f4b345d80d1295872449/tumblr_inline_ngekx4iIr11rzorzv.gif!
Guys what the hell is going on[/bq]
